definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必須先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事別人。

sentences.english: God uses every profession to serve other people.
sentences.chinese: 神使用每一個職業來爲其他人服事。

sentences.english: Bring the tribe of Levi and present them to Aaron the priest to assist him.
sentences.chinese: 你使利未支派近前來，站在祭司亞倫面前好服事他。

sentences.english: The first step to leadership is servanthood.
sentences.chinese: 引導與帶領的首要步驟是服事。

sentences.english: Something missing or needing improvement in my ministry for the past 6 months?
sentences.chinese: 過去六個月服事中，最需加強或改進的部份？

sentences.english: We all are shepherds to God's people first.
sentences.chinese: 牧人用敬拜的心，服事神國的子民。

sentences.english: And all the men of Jabesh said to him, "Make a treaty with us, and we will be subject to you."
sentences.chinese: 雅比衆人對拿轄說，你與我們立約，我們就服事你。

sentences.english: Don't try to figure out your gifts before volunteering to serve somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 還未志願投入服事已先，不要嘗試想要找出你的恩賜。

sentences.english: In God' s eyes, true greatness is serving others.
sentences.chinese: 在上帝眼裏，服事他人才不枉此生。

sentences.english: God intentionally allows you to go through painful experiences to equip you for ministry to others.
sentences.chinese: 神刻意容許你經歷這些痛苦，爲要裝備你去服事別人。

sentences.english: Now serve the Lord your God and his people Israel.
sentences.chinese: 現在要事奉耶和華你們的神，服事他的民以色列。

sentences.english: And again, whom should I serve?
Pride will impede your serving others.
sentences.chinese: 驕傲會阻礙你服事他人。

sentences.english: They had followed Jesus from Galilee to care for his needs.
sentences.chinese: 他們是從加利利跟隨耶穌來服事他的。

sentences.english: God wants you to use your natural interests to serve him and others.
sentences.chinese: 神要你用你天生的興趣去服事他和其他人。

sentences.english: The couple too enjoys preparing refreshments for the group, together with sister Fang Min.
sentences.chinese: 他們也與芳敏姊妹一同享受以預備茶點服事團契。

definition: to pray on behalf of sb
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
the will of Heaven/the will of God
